storm.asynchbase.trident.state

Class AsyncHBaseMapState<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • storm.asynchbase.trident.state.AsyncHBaseMapState<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - State type NON_TRANSACTIONAL / TRANSACTIONAL / OPAQUE.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    storm.trident.state.map.IBackingMap<T>

    public class AsyncHBaseMapState<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements storm.trident.state.map.IBackingMap<T>

    This is a TridentState implementation backed by HBase using AsyncHBase client. If the cacheSize option is provided the State will include a LRU Cache.

    Please look at storm.asynchbase.example.topology.AsyncHBaseTridentMapStateExampleTopology for a concrete use case.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected static class  AsyncHBaseMapState.Factory
      This factory handle state creation.
      static class  AsyncHBaseMapState.Options<T>
      cacheSize : size of the LRU CachedMap timeout : timeout while doing multiget/multiput in milliseconds cluster : AsyncHBase client to use.
